name: Pepperwood Partners
overview:
Pepperwood Partners, LLC is a boutique investment banking advisory firm headquartered in Dallas, Texas. The Pepperwood team includes experienced professionals with backgrounds as successful technology entrepreneurs, money managers, CFOs, private equity bankers and various credentialed analysts.

The firm serves a select group of quality companies, offering comprehensive investment banking solutions with a focus on Emerging Markets, Domestic & International Business, and Internet Technology.

Pepperwood Partners offers to Clients investment banking solutions in the form of: Private Equity Capital Transactions, Mergers & Acquisitions Advisory, and Business Advisory Services. For more information visit, www.pepperwoodpartners.com.
